about.title: About me
about.first-text: I'm a web developer focused on backend development, specializing in Java (Spring Boot) and Node.js with TypeScript. I build secure and scalable RESTful APIs, and I also have experience with frontend technologies like React and TailwindCSS. I'm skilled in working with relational databases such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite, always applying best practices in data modeling.
about.second-text: I'm passionate about solving complex problems, writing clean code, and continuously learning and improving

product_api.title: Product Management - API Rest
product_api.description: This project is a RESTful API built with Spring Boot, designed for managing products, categories, users, and orders.

medical_app.title: Medical Appointments Manager
medical_app.description: This is a web application developed using Spring Boot that allows patients to register, view available doctors, and schedule or cancel medical appointments.

chat_app.title: Real-Time Chat Application
chat_app.description: Real-time messaging app for public rooms and private chats. Built the backend with Node.js + TypeScript, Express, Socket.IO and the frontend with React + TailwindCSS

contact.title: Let's Connect
